item.title: Are Batman movies darker than they used to be?
item.description: By Thais Baracat. April 8, 2022. We can all agree that Batman is the darkest superhero of them all. But after watching the brand-new batman movie, starring Robert Pattinson and ZÃ¶e Kravitz, I caught myself thinking if the franchise movies were getting emotionally darker - or was it just the noir aesthetics? In order to find out, I have selected a collection of batman movies and proceeded with a sentiment analysis of the dialogues held in each film.
